title: Justice Dogar sworn in as CJ IHC
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 08 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Tuesday administered oath of the office of Chief Justice Islamabad High Court to Justice Sardar Muhammad Sarfraz Dogar, in an oath-taking ceremony, held at Aiwan e Sadr.
The ceremony was attended by judges of the high court, Chairman Senate Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani, Chief Minister Punjab Maryam Nawaz, ministers, parliamentarians, representatives and members of lawyersâ€™ bodies and legal fraternity, law officers, lawyers and mediapersons.
Earlier, Justice Dogar has been performing as Acting CJ of IHC.
